DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare refractive outcome two different type combine cataract surgery , namely microinscision cataract surgery smallincision cataract surgery , sutureless 23-gauge vitrectomy patient present vitreoretinal disorder coexist cataract .
DOC.detailed_description: Purpose : To compare refractive outcome combine cataract vitreoretinal surgery . Methods : Patients diagnosis vitreoretinal disorder coexist significant cataract randomly assign treat microincision cataract surgery 23-gauge vitrectomy ( treatment group 1 ) smallincision cataract surgery 23-gauge vitrectomy ( treatment group 2 ) . Main outcome measure : Refractive outcome , stability intraocular lens ( IOL ) , intraocular pressure ( IOP ) functional outcome .
DOC.criteria: diagnosis vitreoretinal disorder coexist cataract combine surgery age 60 year IOL master preoperative intraocularlens ( IOL ) calculation ultrasound IOL calculation due hazy medium ( dense cataract , vitreous hemorrhage ) macular edema , proliferative diabetic retinopathy myopia hyperopia 5 diopter , astigmatism 2 diopter previous refractive surgery , retinal detachment surgery , glaucoma surgery vitrectomy
